name: Astero Dice Racer
description:
A game made for the GMTK GAME JAM 2022

Touch the right dice with your ship.

HOW TO PLAY :
In the top right of the screen, you see the dice that you have to touch with your ship.
Your speed will be your score. Go faster to score more but if you touch another dice, you will die.
You can destroy any dice with your missiles to save your life !

RT or up arrow to accelerate

LT or down arrow to brake (it's VERY useful)

Turn with left and right

Fire with A button (on gamepad) or spacebar
